question.text: What are the final concentrations of all the ions when following are mixed? <math><mn>50</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi></math> of <math><mn>0.12</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>0.10</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></math> and <math><mn>100</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mn>0.26</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi></math>

options.text: <math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.064</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.28</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math> ; <math><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.12</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mo>;</mo><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.04</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math>

<math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.064</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.28</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math> ; <math><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.12</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mo>;</mo><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.104</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math>

<math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.04</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.28</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math> ; <math><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.12</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mo>;</mo><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.104</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math>

<math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.064</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msubsup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo></mrow></msubsup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.8</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math> ; <math><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.12</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><mo>;</mo><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0.104</mn><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">M</mi></math>

solution.text:
Milli-mole of FeNO33 = 50 × 0.12 = 6  (mm=M×VmL)

∴  Milli-mole of Fe3+ = 6 ;

Milli-mole of NO3-=3 ×6= 18 

Milli-mole of FeCl3= 100 × 0.1 = 10

Milli-mole of Fe3+= 10 ;

Milli-mole of Cl- =3 × 10 = 30 

Milli-mole of MgNO32 = 100 × 0.26 = 26

Milli-mole of Mg2+ = 26 ;

Milli-mole of NO3-= 2 × 26 = 52

On mixing these three, total volume he comes 250 mL

Thus Fe3+=6+10250=0.064M

NO3-=18+52250=0.28 M

Cl-=30250=0.12 M

Mg2+=26250=0.104 M
